verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of every one of them a rod <S%H4294><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their princes <S%H5387><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> rods: <S%H4294><s%> write <S%H3789><s%> you every man's <S%H376><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> on his rod. <S%H4294><s%>

And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> on the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> shall be for the head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And you shall lay <S%H3240><s%> them up in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that the man's <S%H376><s%> rod, <S%H4294><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I shall choose, <S%H977><s%> shall blossom: <S%H6524><s%> and I will make to cease <S%H7918><s%> from me the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> one of their princes <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him a rod <S%H4294><s%> apiece, for each prince <S%H5387><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> according to their fathers' <S%H1><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> even twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> rods: <S%H4294><s%> and the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> was among <S%H8432><s%> their rods. <S%H4294><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> laid <S%H3240><s%> up the rods <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness. <S%H5715><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that on <S%H5921><s%> the morrow <S%H4283><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness; <S%H5715><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> was budded, <S%H6524><s%> and brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> buds, <S%H6525><s%> and bloomed <S%H6692><s%> blossoms, <S%H6731><s%> and yielded <S%H1580><s%> almonds. <S%H8247><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and they looked, <S%H7200><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod. <S%H4294><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Bring <S%H7725><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for a token <S%H226><s%> against the rebels; <S%H4805><s%> and you shall quite <S%H3615><s%> take <S%H3615><s%> away their murmurings <S%H8519><s%> from me, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so: as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> we die, <S%H1478><s%> we perish, <S%H6><s%> we all <S%H3605><s%> perish. <S%H6><s%>

Whoever <S%H3605><s%> comes <S%H7131><s%> any thing near <S%H7138><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall die: <S%H4191><s%> shall we be consumed <S%H8552><s%> with dying? <S%H1478><s%>
